general.description:
This station is of a class known as "Life Shell", roughly the equivalent to the k'rinn K'Til'n outposts, but with a small crew.
It features a fuel depot refilled by several asteroids-mining drones, and a mission computer. A small bar entertains the crew and the passing travellers.
general.bar: A few Spacers kill time by discussing with the crew while their ships is being refuelled.
